metadata.title: CVE-2021-47067 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:soc/tegra: regulators: Fix locking up when voltage-spread is out of rangeFix voltage coupler lockup which happens when voltage-spread is outof range due to a bug in the code. The max-spread requirement shall beaccounted when CPU regulator doesn't have consumers. This problem isobserved on Tegra30 Ouya game console once system-wide DVFS is enabledin a device-tree.
